	Prepare and manage property budgets, rent collections, and reports.
	Market available properties through effective channels to minimize vacancies.


Requirements


	Minimum of a Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Estate Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
	3&ndash;5 years of proven experience in property management or real estate operations.
	Strong understanding of the luxury apartment rental market.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and organizational skills.
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple properties efficiently.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@designunionltd.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Personal Assistant Job at Erisco Foods Limited




        
    

        
        Erisco Foods Limited is an indigenous food product manufacturer, incorporated in Nigeria in 2004 and started operations in 2009, manufacturing Tomato Paste, Seasoning, Rice, Milk cubes and more. We are firmly committed to producing high-quality products that combine nourishment with value pricing, as they strive to become one of Nigeria’s largest indigenous foodmanufacturers on a global scale.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Personal Assistant
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a detailed Oriented Personal Assistant to provide high-level administrative support to the MD and ensure the smooth and efficient management of his daily operations.
	The ideal candidate will be incharge ofmanaging the MD’s schedule, coordinating meetings and travel, preparing reports and presentations, and handling confidential information with discretion.


Job Responsibilities


	Manage diary; understanding the importance of key meetings, building flexibility into the diary and anticipating needs
	To organize external visits, meetings, and speaking engagements and coordinate briefing and material, and make travel and accommodation arrangements to ensure budget and time management pressures are met.
	Prepare letters, reports, and other documents
	Screen incoming telephone calls direct them appropriately
	Review incoming correspondence, distribute, and respond accordingly. Follow up where necessary
	Manage and organise administration.


Qualifications


	First Degree in any Management Science,
	2 years of experience as a personal assistant would be advantageous
	A Bachelor’s Degree or its equivalent.
	Knowledgeable in the use of the internet and other electronic office equipment
	Preferably Male.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV to: recruitment@eriscofoodsltd.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

  "description": "Estakem is a leading peanut, cookies, and chin-chin FMCG company. We are dedicated to delivering high-quality, delicious snacks to our customers. Our products are known for their exceptional taste, premium ingredients, and commitment to quality. Some of our products include Kings Delight peanuts cookies and chin-chin.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Field Sales Executive

Job Locations:&nbsp;Anambra, Enugu, and Owerri - Imo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Estakem is looking for a hardworking and motivated Field Sales Executive to help grow sales and expand our market reach in Imo, Enugu, and Anambra States.
	The person will visit markets, build good relationships with customers and distributors, and make sure Estakem snacks are well known and available in all areas.


Key Responsibilities


	Meet sales targets and improve product availability in your area.
	Find and register new distributors, retailers, and sales outlets.
	Visit markets regularly to check sales performance and observe competitors.
	Support promotions and marketing activities to increase product awareness.
	Share feedback and sales reports with your supervisor or manager.


Requirements


	OND, HND qualification, or B.Sc Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
	At least 2 years of experience in field sales (FMCG experience preferred).
	Good communication, negotiation, and people skills.
	Must know the Imo, Enugu, and Anambra markets well.
	Must be self-driven and able to work with little supervision.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 / Month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume in PDF to:&nbsp;estakemhr@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Field Sales Executive&quot; as the subject of the email.

Field Sales Executive Job at Estakem Ventures




        
    

        
        Estakem is a leading peanut, cookies, and chin-chin FMCG company. We are dedicated to delivering high-quality, delicious snacks to our customers. Our products are known for their exceptional taste, premium ingredients, and commitment to quality. Some of our products include Kings Delight peanuts cookies and chin-chin.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Field Sales Executive

Job Locations: Anambra, Enugu, and Owerri - Imo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Estakem is looking for a hardworking and motivated Field Sales Executive to help grow sales and expand our market reach in Imo, Enugu, and Anambra States.
	The person will visit markets, build good relationships with customers and distributors, and make sure Estakem snacks are well known and available in all areas.


Key Responsibilities


	Meet sales targets and improve product availability in your area.
	Find and register new distributors, retailers, and sales outlets.
	Visit markets regularly to check sales performance and observe competitors.
	Support promotions and marketing activities to increase product awareness.
	Share feedback and sales reports with your supervisor or manager.


Requirements


	OND, HND qualification, or B.Sc Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
	At least 2 years of experience in field sales (FMCG experience preferred).
	Good communication, negotiation, and people skills.
	Must know the Imo, Enugu, and Anambra markets well.
	Must be self-driven and able to work with little supervision.


Salary
